definitions.definition: The act of heaping or piling up.
The act of exaggerating ; the act of doing or representing in an excessive manner; a going beyond the bounds of truth, reason, or justice; a hyperbolical representation; hyperbole ; overstatement .
examples: They say he's a millionnaire, but that's a massive exaggeration .

definitions.definition: A representation of things beyond natural life, in expression, beauty, power, vigor.

main_definition: The act of heaping or piling up.
secondary_definitions: The act of exaggerating ; the act of doing or representing in an excessive manner; a going beyond the bounds of truth, reason, or justice; a hyperbolical representation; hyperbole ; overstatement .
A representation of things beyond natural life, in expression, beauty, power, vigor.
